All Classes

Class
Description
BankTransactions
This class contains the static methods for all the money transactions that occur between the players or between the player and the bank
Board
This class is the board of the game, which contains an ArrayList of Tiles
BoardTest
 
BuyerTile
Subclass of Tile, the only difference from Tile is the action method that performs the necessary actions of each round
Card
The interface for all cards, contains methods to get and set the message of a card, its value, its picture and its title
CardDeck
This class is a deck of cards (basically and ArrayList of Card classes) and methods are included to get the top card, to add a card at the bottom of the deck, shuffle the deck, etc.
CardDeckTest
 
CardInventoryUI
A window that contains all the cards of a player
Controller
Controller is the master of the game and controls all of the operations executed
DealCard
Implements the Card Interface and it contains all the data needed for a DealCard and the methods to access and transform the data
DealCardTest
 
DealTile
Subclass of Tile, the only difference from Tile is the action method that performs the necessary actions of each round
DeckType
 
Dice
This is the class of a dice.
DiceTest
 
FamilyCasinoTile
Subclass of Tile, the only difference from Tile is the action method that performs the necessary actions of each round
GraphicUI
The main window of the game that contains the board, the dices, the players and all the Necessary buttons that each player needs
IconList
 
Jackpot
Jackpot contains the money that has been collected from the players and when a player wins the jackpot he receives the collected money
JackpotTest
 
LotteryTile
Subclass of Tile, the only difference from Tile is the action method that performs the necessary actions of each round
MailCardTest
 
Main
 
MessageCard
Implements the Card Interface and it contains all the data needed for a MessageCard and the methods to access and transform the data
MessageTile
Subclass of Tile, the only difference from Tile is the action method that performs the necessary actions of each round, and there is an extra member that holds how many message cards should be opened
Pawn
 
PayDayCards
 
PaydayTile
 
Player
Player class (implements PlayerADT) describes the characteristics of a player (name, cards he has collected, money, loans, bills) and provides modification methods
PlayerADT
The interface of a Player with the declaration of the methods that set, get and modify the attributes of the Player
PlayerAndTransactionsTest
 
Point
A class that holds x,y coordinates
RadioTile
Subclass of Tile, the only difference from Tile is the action method that performs the necessary actions of each round
StartTile
Subclass of Tile, is this subclass the tileAction method is empty as the starting tile has no action
SweepTakesTile
Subclass of Tile, the only difference from Tile is the action method that performs the necessary actions of each round
Tile
This is an abstract class of a general Tile.
YardSaleTile
Subclass of Tile, the only difference from Tile is the action method that performs the necessary actions of each round
